updateinfo.notes: direct link: https://github.com/jasonagilbertson/textFilter/releases/download/release/textFilter.exe.zip 0.7.7077.38334 - ctrl-D to display all items for highlighted filter in new window, fix grouping, filterIndex 0.7.7054.28449 - fix filter and file recent lists 0.7.7054.24386 - add Expect100Continue / TLS 1.2 for git release download. 0.7.0.34411 - add filterIndex in file view, f3 / shift+f3 (next / previous), autocolor selection for new filters, ctrl-m formats xml, csv, and json 0.7.0.015 - add autocolor, hotkey add filter item, filterindex column 0.7.0.012 - add go to filter, view message
